titleStmt.title: The sea-mans grammar and dictionary explaining all the difficult terms in navigation : and the practical navigator and gunner : in two parts / by Captain John Smith, sometimes governour of Virginia, and admiral of New England.
titleStmt.author: Smith, John, 1580-1631.

biblFull.extent: [8], 163 p., [1] folded leaf of plates : ill.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: "I. Most plain and easie directions to build, rigg, yard and mast any ship whatsoever ... II. An abstract of the art of gunnery ... and an appendix how ... to take heights, depths and distances ... "
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
